'''THE DATES IN THE SCHEDULE TAKEN FROM THE HardyReleaseSchedule.'''

* ''Please do not edit''
* Freezes normally happen at the start of the given date, UTC time.  So last minute changes need to happen the day before.
* Some background information and Q&A about the Ubuntu release process can be found on TimeBasedReleases
* See the <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/KernelTeam/Hardy/KernelSchedule|kernel schedule spec too]]</nowiki>
* See the <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/OtherProjectSchedules|schedules of other projects]]</nowiki>
* Until approximately Alpha 1 the focus of bug triaging should be on SRU bugs for Gutsy
* From Alpha 1 forward the focus of bug triaging should be on Hardy
